nodes.text: Pooja Naberrie was a human female and member of the Naberrie family from the planet Naboo. She was a child when the Clone Wars ended in 19 BBY, the same year her aunt, Senator Padmé Amidala, died in childbirth. Naberrie attended Amidala's funeral ceremony in the capital city of the Naboo homeworld, shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire.
Naberrie had brown curly hair, brown eyes, and light skin.
Pooja wore an elegant traditional children's dress made from natural materials. At her aunt's funeral, she wore a black dress to show her mourning.

Pooja Naberrie was played by the actress Hayley Mooy. She first appeared in a deleted scene in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. She appears at the end of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith attending Padmé Amidala's funeral and is named in the film's closing credits.
